title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: Effective Teacher Technology Integration Strategies in Technology-Rich Classrooms

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can select appropriate digital tools for educational activities using a framework that evaluates technology-task fit (TTF)
Learners can analyze barriers to technology adoption based on the TAM model and develop support strategies
Learners can enhance student engagement by at least 20% through technology-integrated lesson designs tailored to language curriculum characteristics

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
